Before you can connect Alexa with Xiaomi smart devices, you need to follow these steps: 1. Download "Mi Home" app from Google Play or App Store. 2. Sign up or sign in with your Xiaomi account. 3. Setup the device with your "Mi Home" app, and make sure you can control it in the app.
